title: REMOVE THE PERMA BAN!!! ITS UNFAIR
body: Riot, ive had my account Perma banned for legit no reason, people who duo queue and report my account because they werent impressed with my gameplay. if i was reported and perma banned for that then its unfair, remove the perma ban, its basically theft if you ban an account that ive spent my own money i worked hard to get and you guys just get to say no and keep my account and money. thats unfair and i wish that you remove all perma bans. if you dont i wont stop creating threads and bringing this issue to justice! i know im not the only one out there who believes in this. EVERYONE WHO HAS HAD THEIR ACCOUNTS UNFAILY PERMA BANNED RESPOND . WE NEED TO REBEL AGAINST THIS AND GET WHAT IS RIGHTFULLY OURS BACK FROM THIS DISGUSTING SHIT FACED COMPANY WHO THINKS THEY CAN TAKE WHAT EVER THEY WANT!!!

it doesn't matter if one person, a premade, or 9 people report you- if you didn't do anything, you wont be punished

> remove the perma ban, its basically theft if you ban an account that ive spent my own money i worked hard to get and you guys just get to say no and keep my account and money.

you agreed that they are in no liability and that they reserve the right to not grant you a refund in the terms of use when you signed up/ installed/played the game. you also don't own the digital content either, only a limited right to access it.

> thats unfair and i wish that you remove all perma bans. if you dont i wont stop creating threads and bringing this issue to justice! 

you'll probably get a forum ban for spamming, but either way bringing it up here wont get anything done being that the majority of the people here aren't rioters

> i know im not the only one out there who believes in this. EVERYONE WHO HAS HAD THEIR ACCOUNTS UNFAILY PERMA BANNED RESPOND . WE NEED TO REBEL AGAINST THIS AND GET WHAT IS RIGHTFULLY OURS BACK FROM THIS DISGUSTING SHIT FACED COMPANY WHO THINKS THEY CAN TAKE WHAT EVER THEY WANT!!!

no one has their account "unfairly" banned. the only way to get an account ban is either by breaking the rules, doing a chargeback, or its a shield ban. the first being 99% of the cases being that people seem to think they are innocent when they actually aren't, the second being illegal (fraud), and the third for security if they detect suspicious activity on your account.
but ill kind of give you an exception here, because false-positives still are possible, albeit extremely rare.

>Perma banned for legit no reason

Can you provide your chat logs and a brief outline of your recent punishments? That will help us know if this is a mistake, or a rightful ban that you may disagree with.

So, I get you're frustrated, but screaming and spewing nonsense about how it's "rightfully yours" (when you agreed to the Terms of Use which state it's **not** "rightfully" yours) isn't going to help.

Second, if you want to claim that your ban was for "legit no reason", it helps if you provide **proof** of that - i.e. chat logs, or whatever Riot gives you when you log into the client.

>if you dont i wont stop creating threads and bringing this issue to justice!

That will likely only result in you getting a forum ban.

>WHAT IS RIGHTFULLY OURS BACK

Good luck getting back whatever you lost. Sure as hell ain't your account.
